events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team is excited to review your qualifications and experience to see if you are a good fit.
Your application has been successfully categorized under the Engineering department, focusing on software development roles that match your skills and background.
A specialized recruiter from our Engineering hiring team has been assigned to your case and will contact you soon for the next steps.
Your initial screening interview has been completed successfully. We were impressed by your experience with modern software engineering practices.
Thank you for your prompt response to our interview feedback. We appreciate your enthusiasm about contributing to our software projects.
A technical interview has been scheduled for you on May 10th. Please prepare for a coding challenge and system design discussion with our lead developers.
